posts.postText:
After say, 1 or 2 past TF2 servers that have been up for about 3 days and then gone down again for good, I am very pleased to announce that NNJG now has it's own official Team Fortress 2 server, contributed by  Dum  (dumdadumdoo), who has gained his V.I.P privelages because of it. On behalf of all of us here, I would like to thank him for his kindness,  and for saving me a few bucks .
The server has 16 slots so you don't have to worry about it getting too crowded.

If you would like to connect, fire up Team Fortress 2 and just type this into the console:

 connect 65.99.210.177:27015 


In other news, i have just received word that our fellow admins Cake & Punkedmind will be moving to California and adopting Asian babies! 
Our entire team's thoughts and prayers go out to this young but lovely couple. XD

~Kryzoid
LOL! You really added that part? xD!

First off, yay at TF2 server. I am TFC veteran and have wanted to get into TF2, wanted too but haven't played more than a few rounds yet.

Second thank you Kryzoid for announcement :). First will be named Logan, thinking about naming second Ben but need to discuss it with Punk first ;P. Our wedding gift registry is at http://store.steampowered.com/  . Thank you for your support and Kryzoid is already reserved as Godfather XD.
LOL @ Naming it Logan. What if it's a girl? Debby?

>> Ben":1xxrheyg]
LOL @ Naming it Logan. What if it's a girl? Debby?
 
If it was a girl we were gonna name it after you, LOL JUST KIDDING.
